data.name: Platform Roll
data.detailed_description:
About

PlatformRoll is a side scroller game with challenging obstacles including bombs, bomb guns and gaps through platforms. You have to maneuver the ball across all the platforms in the dark with only a little light in order to reach the next level.

Compete against an online leaderboard and see how fast you can complete each level.

How To Play

Key A / Left Arrow - Move left.
Key D / Right Arrow - Move right.
Key W / Space / Up Arrow - Jump.

Key R - Restart game.

ESC - Open & close pause menu.
TAB - Open & close leaderboard.

Note

Invisible trigger boxes, bombs, bomb guns or obstacles that push you of the platform will respawn you at a checkpoint. If you fall in the water it's an automatic restart at the starting point and NOT at the checkpoint.

Features

20 levels with more to come in future upgrades.
Steam Leaderboards to compete with the world.
Steam Achievements.
Collect gold pickups for future ball skins.

Compete against an online leaderboard and see how fast you can complete each level.

data.short_description: PlatformRoll is a game with challenging obstacles including bombs, guns and gaps through platforms. Maneuver the ball across all the platforms in the dark with only a little light in order to reach the next level. Compete against an online leaderboard and see how fast you can complete each level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
